Package Phase1

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phase1.Search
  • public class Search
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes the methods to support the search of a solution.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Search

        public Search()

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static void search​(int selectedAlgorithm)
        Helper function which starts a basic search algorithm.

      • selectAlgorithm

        public static void selectAlgorithm​(int id,
                                   int[][] field)
        Selects and executes a search algorithm based on the provided algorithm ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The algorithm ID representing the selected search algorithm: - 1: Random Search - 2: Brute Force Search - 3: DX Search - 4: Flood Fill
        field - A matrix representing the board on which the search algorithm operates.

      • characterToID

        public static int characterToID​(char character)
        Get as input the character representation of a pentomino and translate it into its corresponding numerical value (ID).
        Parameters:
        character - a character representing a pentomino
        Returns:
        the corresponding ID (numerical value)

      • addPiece

        public static void addPiece​(int[][] field,
                            int[][] piece,
                            int pieceID,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Adds a pentomino to the position on the field (overriding the current board at that position).
        Parameters:
        field - a matrix representing the board to be fulfilled with pentominoes
        piece - a matrix representing the pentomino to be placed on the board
        pieceID - ID of the relevant pentomino
        x - x position of the pentomino
        y - y position of the pentomino

      • removePiece

        public static void removePiece​(int[][] field,
                               int[][] piece,
                               int x,
                               int y)
        Removes a pentomino from the position on the field.
        Parameters:
        field - a matrix representing the board with pentominoes
        piece - a matrix representing the pentomino to be removed
        x - x position of the pentomino to be removed
        y - y position of the pentomino to be removed

      • canPlacePiece

        public static boolean canPlacePiece​(int[][] field,
                                    int[][] piece,
                                    int x,
                                    int y)
        Check if a pentomino piece can be placed at a given position on the field.
        Parameters:
        field - a matrix representing the board
        piece - a matrix representing the pentomino piece
        x - x position on the field
        y - y position on the field
        Returns:
        true if the piece can be placed, false otherwise

      • emptyBoard

        public static int[][] emptyBoard​(int[][] field)
        Initializes and returns an empty game board represented as a matrix, setting all cells to -1.
        Parameters:
        field - The matrix representing the game board where each cell can have one of the following values: -1: Represents an empty square on the board. N: Represents the ID of a pentomino occupying the square (N is a positive number).
        Returns:
        An empty game board where all cells are set to -1 (representing empty squares).

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main function. Needs to be executed to start the basic search algorithm.
